title: PROMO series reset after winning 2 games
body:
C'mon it's hard enough for me to climb ...don't reset my promos like that for no reason :v 

{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Ah nvm it's probably because i accidentally dodged the second game (forgot 2 lock)
dodging does not count as a game so you have been robbed
Dodging does count as a loss if you are in promotion series, it explicitly states this in the tooltip that pops up.

Nothing appears on the ladder board after dodging, so if you arent aware of this you may think that it's a bug...
You are right, dodging count as a loss in promos 
But thx to that "lost" victory i had a pretty good mmr it took me jst a couple of games to win that *****
Dudeee the same thing happened to me riot please fix
I've lost 1 game and won 2, after the second win my promos have reset.. Why?! Did i do something wrong? Is it just a bug or another way to force us to spend more time on lol? :v
